Detailed Description

cvmx_gmx::_tx::_clk

Per Port

GMX_TX_CLK = RGMII TX Clock Generation Register

Notes: Programming Restrictions: (1) In RGMII mode, if GMX_PRT_CFG[SPEED]==0, then CLK_CNT must be > 1. (2) In MII mode, CLK_CNT == 1 (3) In RGMII or GMII mode, if CLK_CNT==0, Octeon will not generate a tx clock.

RGMII Example: Given a 125MHz PLL reference clock... CLK_CNT == 1 ==> 125.0MHz TXC clock period (8ns* 1) CLK_CNT == 5 ==> 25.0MHz TXC clock period (8ns* 5) CLK_CNT == 50 ==> 2.5MHz TXC clock period (8ns*50)
